:• 2x '''1625''' Mbps - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan., 1024QAM) :• 1x '''750''' Mbps - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 1024QAM) = '''''4000 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Nighthawk X6S - AC4000 Tri-band WiFi Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/wifi-routers/R8000P.aspx}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=R8000P}} Netgear Board ID: *''U12H359T00_NETGEAR'' {{see also|Netgear R8000|Netgear R8500|Foxconn}} ===Review=== *[http://technoxy.com/netgear-nighthawk-x6s-ac4000-r8000p-wifi-router-review/ ''Nighthawk X6S AC4000 Tri-band WiFi Router'' On '''Technoxy'''] ===Forum threads=== *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/netgear-nighthawk-x6s-adds-mu-mimo-alexa-support.39795/ ''NETGEAR Nighthawk X6S - MU-MIMO, Alexa Support'' on '''SNB''' forums] *[http://koolshare.cn/thread-120057-1-1.html ''Netgear R8000P AC4000'' on '''KoolShare''' forums] (Internal photos) *[http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:65087 ''Netgear R8000P'' on '''iXBT''' forums] (CFE bootloader 1.0.6 -> 1.0.8) {{SCollapse|CFE boot >> • |
